long_description: Spray on the natural Coleman Botanicals insect repellent to enjoy a summer day without the nuisance of bugs. 100% natural, plant-based insect repellent contains lemon eucalyptus oil to keep mosquitoes and ticks away for up to 6 hrs. Does not contain DEET. Coleman Botanicals insect repellent formula is nongreasy and has a light fragrance.
short_description: Spray on the natural Coleman Botanicals insect repellent to enjoy a summer day without the nuisance of bugs.
